reviewText: Very cute movie! I love how the wishes came true!
great movie, came in when it said it would
Love both of these movies and the actors & actresses were all terrific!

This movie A Wish Come True starring Megan Park (Lindsay Corwin who is celebrating her 30 birthday.  In the first few minutes of the movie Lindsay is celebrating her 25th birthday. At the end of her birthday Lindsay writes her birthday wishes but as far none of her wishes have come true.  At her 30th birthday Lindsay decides to write her wishes one more time. The following morning Lindsay wakes up to a surprise that all her wishes have come true. A few of Lindsay's wishes were get a puppy, get a new car, new house, promotion at her job, her brother to get chicken pox, find her perfect man. Lindsay meets a man named Reed (Anthony Lemke) from work. Lindsay thinks she found her perfect guy in Reed.  Lindsay has a best friend named Dave Landry (Benjamin Hollingsworth) who has been there for her though everything. Dave has loved Lindsay for years.  Watch this movie to see which guy Lindsay ends up with. Does she end up end with Reed or Dave. I love this movie but to tell you the truth after I bought it and saw the French words below the English I thought the movie was going to be only in French.  But as soon as I relieved the movie today I watch it and discovered that they do offer you a English version and a French version. FYI the reason why the movie offers two languages is because the company  Imavision is a Quebec company. I hope you Love it!!!!  I am fan of Megan Park since Secret Life of the American Teenager days. Secret Life fan watch this movie!!!
